interface.name: agent.world.Reinforceable
interface.description: Every simulated entities that can be reinforced by agent Unit. Reinforcement make target entity enhanced with physical capabilities of agent Unit.

method.name: reinforceIt
method.description: To reinforce this element. Returns 'true' if this element has been reinforced.

method.name: canBeReinforced
method.description: Returns 'true' if subject agent can reinforce this element, 'false' otherwise.
